item.title: The visionary Rolls-Royce 103EX. Journey into the future of luxury.
item.description:
The visionary Rolls-Royce 103EX. Journey into the future of luxury.

For over 100 years, Rolls-Royce has been pushing the boundaries of art and engineering. Now, we have imagined the future. But we didn't stop there - we built it. Discover Rolls-Royce 103EX: http://bit.ly/239RcqJ

item.title: Titanium Pocket Tool
item.description:
Titanium Pocket Tool

New Balance have released a very clean version of their classic New Balance 530 runner. The white and grey M530CCR keeps the original silhouette from the 90Â´s and sits atop an ENCAP-cushioned sole. The classic runner sports a simple greyscale aesthetic with black accents throughout, and mixes bold mesh and lightweight synthetic materials for an old-school look.

item.title: Amputee Gets Awesome Metal Gear Solid Bionic Arm
item.description:
Amputee Gets Awesome Metal Gear Solid Bionic Arm

James Young, a man from the UK was in a freak accident with a train a few years back that led to him losing his left arm and leg. James was an avid video game player and he happened on an ad from game firm Konami looking for an amputee to try out a slick new prosthetic arm.

item.title: Biotech Given Permission To Attempt To Wake Up The Brain After Death
item.description:
Biotech Given Permission To Attempt To Wake Up The Brain After Death

Image credit: Jon Olav Eikenes via Flickr A biotech company in the US has been granted ethical permission to recruit 20 patients for what is sure to be a controversial study. Patients declared clinically dead from a traumatic brain injury will be used to test whether parts of their central nervous system can be brought back to life.

item.title: Tennessee Gets a Place at the Table with Newest Element: Tennessine
item.description:
Tennessee Gets a Place at the Table with Newest Element: Tennessine

One of the newest members of the periodic table will likely have a familiar sound to it, even if the spelling might be a bit off: Tennessine. Proposed as a nod to researchers from Oak Ridge National Laboratory, Vanderbilt University, and UT who helped confirm its existence , element 117 would be only the second to be named for a state.

item.title: Get StoryShop | Better Stories Faster
item.description:
Get StoryShop | Better Stories Faster

The StoryShop app is under development and coming soon.

item.title: Top 10 Best Character Arcs in Film
item.description:
Top 10 Best Character Arcs in Film

What makes a hero develop? And how does he or she grow? Subscribe: http://goo.gl/9AGRm The best characters are the ones that grow and change and sometimes learn a lesson. These characters can help us learn something about ourselves, about society, or the world at large. Here are our top 10 character arcs in film history.
